topics.body:
Talking about female role models, i just noticed how trought history there hasnt been a female rapper worth talking about, which its obvious, but even digging deeper not even a female underground one that holds the same bar other rap giants did.

Most female rappers seem a fashion statement, and mostly braggadoci8 rap, and god knows we have enought of those on the male side as it is..

It would be awesome if a female rapper dropped a classic album ala WMWTSO or madvillainy.

or a GKMC

topics.body:
Uuuuh, i been having a lot of problems with my pc lately regarding an error.

Basically sometimes my pc in the morning might turn up normally and shit, but sometimes after restarting it, logging leads to a black screen, then a BSOD saying error 0xc000021a.

After going into safe mode and running sfc scannow it works again, but then it keeps on happening.

And then there are sometimes where it might log on nor ally, and after a few mins the desktop turns purple a la windows 8.1 and the error comes up again.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc
